doc.title: Morgen maandag
doc.plot: This comedy format on Sunday in prime-time, hence -and teasingly- entitled "Tomorrow Monday", was a deliberately in part unpredictable mix of talk show, sketches and interaction with the Flemish public at large, including mass-dares (one caused a monumental motorway queue) and its own printed weekly magazine. Its fictitious character Xavier De Baere, the so-called "professional Goodbye-sayer", ended each episode in a rattling flood of pseudo-eloquent semi-gibberish drowned in exaggeration, repetition and various elaborate nonsense, fitting his nerdy wrong-size jersey.
